content.title: 「Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3：The Black Order」発売日と予告編 - フォーブス
content.desc: Nintendo Switch is getting a heavy-hitting exclusive in 2019. MUA 3 TBO On Thursday night at the Game Awards in Los Angeles, Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order was announced as a Switch exclusive, and this nifty trailer was released. MUA3 BO will be out in 2019, though a specific month wasn’t shared, however, the actual gameplay in the trailer was great to see. The Marvel Ultimate Alliance series is a great fit for the Switch, but it’s also the kind of game that will attract owners of other consoles. It’s been 10 years since the last MUA game. In this version, you are charged with ...
